We had some diesel fuel issues on our emergency generator

We had some diesel fuel issues on our large emergency backup generator. Fortunately, we don't need to run the generator very much, but unfortunately, the fuel was going bad because it wasn't getting turned over enough over time. I found Hot Shot's Secret online after a few minutes of searching and ordered enough to do my 2500 gallon fuel tank. Unequivocally, I can say that the Diesel Extreme brought my fuel back to life so I didn't have to replace 2500 gallons of fuel at over $5 per gallon. As an added benefit, the varnish inside the fuel rails and all the injectors was completely dissolved and fully cleaned. Performance on the generator is restored and back to OEM specifications. I was so impressed with the improvements on the generator that I ordered a quart for my F250 (which significantly improved drivability and performance of the truck) and I also ordered a quart of the Gasoline Extreme for my F150. This is a product that I highly recommend for diesel fuel. Although I haven't put the additive in my gas-powered F150 yet, I expect similar results. BTW, if you have any questions, call their office. It's obvious that they are very knowledgeable and are passionate about helping customers get the right product.
